# Welcome to Health Data Sandbox Hub 
:::

Welcome to the Health Data Sandbox. This site consists of several modules focused on health data, each highlighting specific software and analytical approaches. Topics include:

- Electronic health records
- Precision medicine
- Dynamic risk prediction.


:::{.callout-warning title="HPC best practices"}
We offer in-person workshops, keep an eye on the upcoming events on the [Sandbox website](https://hds-sandbox.github.io/news.html).
:::
